name: Meganium
flavorText:
The aroma that
rises from its
petals contains a substance that
calms aggressive
feelings.

previous.name: Bayleef
previous.flavorText:
The scent of
spices comes from
around its neck. Somehow, sniffing
it makes you want
to fight.

next.name: Cyndaquil
next.flavorText:
It has a timid nature. If it is startled, the flames on
its back burn more vigorously.

pokemon.name: Chikorita
pokemon.flavorText:
A sweet aroma
gently wafts from
the leaf on its head. It is docile
and loves to soak
up the sun's rays.

pokemon.name: Bayleef
pokemon.flavorText:
The scent of
spices comes from
around its neck. Somehow, sniffing
it makes you want
to fight.
